result.name: gb-day-visits-survey
result.notes:
Annual official statistic measuring the volume and value of tourism leisure day trips in Britain.   Jointly sponsored by VisitEngland, Visit Scotland and Visit Wales. Publication schedule for monthly results is at http://www.visitengland.org/Images/Continuous%20surveys_2013_v7_tcm30-32182.pdf

All current survey deliverables (including online data browser) are at http://www.visitengland.org/insight-statistics/major-tourism-surveys/dayvisitors/
result.title: GB Day Visits Survey

extras.value: The data is complex (multiple levels) - a bespoke database is produced for use with Reports for Surveys, requiring specialist training, i.e. cannot be used without an RfS licence and specific database training.This means that at present there is no single general access dataset which could be published, with cost and resource implications for developing this in future, which will need to be reviewed before making any decision about this. VE will review formats of current deliverables (mainly pdf) to explore scope to additionally publish in other formats.
